summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3734 for the improvement of Iowa Avenue, from West Spokane Street to West Andover Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers, under Ordinance No. 45850, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund. .
